creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: groups of women walk on rainy street; tall pagoda rises at center; blossoming trees dominate the frame; greenish cast to image
markings: mark, on back, in pencil: 800 | LRC, red artist\'s seal A: 博 (Hiroshi)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
signed: LRC, printed: よし田 {Yoshida} | L margin, printed: 自摺　上野公園 {jizuri, Ueno Kōen} | bottom margin, in pencil: A Glimpse of Ueno Park | Hiroshi Yoshida
title: Ueno Park
